mapper.select: SELECT U.NO , U.DEPARTMENT_NO , U.RANK_NO , R.NAME AS RANK_NAME , U.POSITION_NO , U.STATE_NO , U.AGENT , U.DIVISION_NO , U.ID , U.PWD , U.NAME , U.GENDER , U.BIRTH_DATE , U.PROFILE , U.LINE_INTRO , U.ADDRESS , U.PHONE , U.MAIL , U.REGISTRATION_DATE , U.LEAVE_REASON , U.LEAVE_DATE , U.OFFICE_NUMBER , U.LEAVE_COUNT , U.CAPACITY FROM "USER" U JOIN RANK R ON U.RANK_NO = R.NO

SELECT P.NO , P.TITLE , P.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE , P.TEAM_NAME , U.NAME AS USER_NAME , U.NO AS USER_NO FROM PROJECT P JOIN PROJECT_TEAM_MEMBER M ON P.NO = M.PROJECT_NO JOIN "USER" U ON M.USER_NO = U.NO WHERE P.NO = ${pjNo}
SELECT NO , TITLE , CONTENT , START_DATE , END_DATE , TEAM_NAME FROM PROJECT WHERE TEAM_NAME = #{teamName}
SELECT NO , TITLE , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT S.NO , S.TITLE , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , U.NAME FROM SUGGESTION S JOIN "USER" U ON S.USER_NO = U.NO ORDER BY S.NO DESC

SELECT P.NO , P.TITLE , P.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE , P.TEAM_NAME , U.NAME AS USER_NAME , U.NO AS USER_NO FROM PROJECT P JOIN PROJECT_TEAM_MEMBER M ON P.NO = M.PROJECT_NO JOIN "USER" U ON M.USER_NO = U.NO ORDER BY P.NO DESC
